SummaryStateClass.doc:
The `SummaryState <#opm.io.sim.SummaryState>`_ class - this is where the current summary results of the simulator are stored.
The `SummaryState <#opm.io.sim.SummaryState>`_ class has methods to get hold of well, group and general variables.

SummaryState_update.doc:
Updates or increments the given variable of the `SummaryState <#opm.io.sim.SummaryState>`_, depending on whether the variable is cumulative or not. The variable must already exist in the `SummaryState <#opm.io.sim.SummaryState>`_ for this. 

:param variable_name: The name of the variable to update or increment.
:type variable_name: str
:param value: The value to set or increment the variable by.
:type value: double

SummaryState_update_well_var.signature: opm.io.sim.SummaryState.update_well_var(well_name: str, variable_name: str, new_value: double) -> None
SummaryState_update_well_var.doc:
Updates the variable of a well.

:param well_name: The name of the well.
:type well_name: str
:param variable_name: The name of the variable to update.
:type variable_name: str
:param new_value: The new value of the variable.
:type new_value: double

SummaryState_update_group_var.signature: opm.io.sim.SummaryState.update_group_var(group_name: str, variable_name: str, new_value: double) -> None
SummaryState_update_group_var.doc:
Updates the variable of a group.

:param group_name: The name of the group.
:type group_name: str
:param variable_name: The name of the variable to update.
:type variable_name: str
:param new_value: The new value of the variable.
:type new_value: double

SummaryState_well_var.doc:
Gets the value of a variable for a well.

:param well_name: The name of the well.
:type well_name: str
:param variable_name: The name of the variable to retrieve.
:type variable_name: str

:return: The value of the specified variable for the well. 
:type return: double

SummaryState_group_var.doc:
Gets the value of a variable for a group.

:param group_name: The name of the group.
:type group_name: str
:param variable_name: The name of the variable to retrieve.
:type variable_name: str

:return: The value of the specified variable for the group. 
:type return: double

SummaryState_elapsed.doc:
Returns the elapsed time in seconds of the current simulation.

:return: The elapsed time in seconds. 
:type return: double

SummaryState_groups.doc:
Returns a list of strings containing all group names.

:return: A list of strings representing all group names. 
:type return: list

SummaryState_wells.doc:
Returns a list of strings containing all well names.

:return: A list of strings representing all well names. 
:type return: list

SummaryState_contains.doc:
Checks if a variable exists in the `SummaryState <#opm.io.sim.SummaryState>`_.

:param variable_name: The name of the variable to check.
:type variable_name: str

:return: True if the variable exists, False otherwise. 
:type return: bool

SummaryState_has_well_var.doc:
Checks if a well variable exists.

:param well_name: The name of the well.
:type well_name: str
:param variable_name: The name of the variable to check.
:type variable_name: str

:return: True if the variable exists for the well, False otherwise. 
:type return: bool

SummaryState_has_group_var.doc:
Checks if a group variable exists.

:param group_name: The name of the group.
:type group_name: str
:param variable_name: The name of the variable to check.
:type variable_name: str

:return: True if the variable exists for the group, False otherwise. 
:type return: bool

SummaryState_setitem.doc:
Updates or insert the variable of the `SummaryState <#opm.io.sim.SummaryState>`_.

:param variable_name: The name of the variable to update or insert.
:type variable_name: str
:param new_value: The new value of the variable.
:type new_value: double

SummaryState_getitem.doc:
Gets the value of a variable of the `SummaryState <#opm.io.sim.SummaryState>`_.

:param variable_name: The name of the variable to retrieve.
:type variable_name: str

:return: The value of the specified variable for the well. 
:type return: double

EclipseStateClass.doc:
The EclipseState class - this is a representation of all static properties in the model,ranging from porosity to relperm tables.
The content of the EclipseState is immutable and may not be changed at runtime.

EclipseState_input_nnc.doc:
Returns a list of non-neighboring connections.

One non-neighboring connection is a tuple containing the following elements:
- index1 (int): Index of the first cell.
- index2 (int): Index of the second cell.
- transmissibility (double): Transmissibility between the two cells.

:return: A list of non-neighboring connections. 
:type return: list

EclipseState_faultNames.doc:
Returns a list of fault names.

:return: A list containing the names of faults. 
:type return: list

EclipseState_faultFaces.doc:
Returns a list of faces of a fault with the given name.

:param fault_name: The name of the fault.
:type fault_name: str

:return: A list containing the faces of the specified fault. 
:type return: list

EclipseState_jfunc.doc:
Function returning a dictionary with the following entries: ['FLAG', 'DIRECTION', 'ALPHA_FACTOR', 'BETA_FACTOR', 'OIL_WATER', 'GAS_OIL']

:return: A dictionary containing the specified entries. 
:type return: dict

EclipseState_simulation.doc:
Returns the simulation configuration.

:return: The simulation configuration. 
:type return: SimulationConfiguration

ScheduleClass.doc: The Schedule class - this is a representation of all the content from the SCHEDULE section, notably all well and group information and the timestepping.

Schedule_getitem.doc:
Returns the `ScheduleState <#ScheduleState>`_ at the given report step.

:param report_step: The report step.
:type report_step: int

:return: The `ScheduleState <#ScheduleState>`_ at the given report step.
:type return: ScheduleState

Schedule_shut_well_well_name_step.doc:
Shuts down a well at a given report step.

:param well_name: The name of the well to shut down.
:type well_name: str
:param step: The report step at which to shut down the well.
:type step: int

Schedule_shut_well_well_name.doc:
Shuts down a well at the current report step.

:param well_name: The name of the well to shut down.
:type well_name: str

Schedule_open_well_well_name_step.doc:
Opens a well at a given report step.

:param well_name: The name of the well to open.
:type well_name: str
:param step: The report step at which to open the well.
:type step: int
:raises ValueError: If the report step is in the past or exceeds the duration of the simulation.

Schedule_open_well_well_name.doc:
Opens a well at the current report step.

:param well_name: The name of the well to open.
:type well_name: str

Schedule_stop_well_well_name_step.doc:
Stops a well at a given report step.

:param well_name: The name of the well to stop.
:type well_name: str
:param step: The report step at which to stop the well.
:type step: int
:raises ValueError: If the report step is in the past or exceeds the duration of the simulation.

Schedule_stop_well_well_name.doc:
Stops a well at the current report step.

:param well_name: The name of the well to stop.
:type well_name: str

Schedule_get_injection_properties.doc:
Gets injection properties for a well at a specific report step.

:param well_name: The name of the well.
:type well_name: str
:param report_step: The report step to retrieve properties for.
:type report_step: int

:return: A dict containing the properties surf_inj_rate, resv_inj_rate, bhp_target, thp_target. 
:type return: dict

Schedule_get_production_properties.doc:
Gets production properties for a well at a specific report step.

:param well_name: The name of the well.
:type well_name: str
:param report_step: The report step to retrieve properties for.
:type report_step: int

:return: A dict containing the properties oil_rate, gas_rate, water_rate, liquid_rate, resv_rate, bhp_target, thp_target, alq_value. 
:type return: dict

Schedule_groups.doc:
Gets a list of all groups at a specified report step.

:param report_step: The report step to retrieve groups for.
:type report_step: int

:return: A list containing all groups at the specified report step. 
:type return: list

Schedule_start.doc:
Retrieves the start time of the schedule as a `datetime.datetime <https://docs.python.org/3/library/datetime.html#datetime.datetime>`_.

:return: The start time of the schedule.
:type return: datetime.datetime

Schedule_end.doc:
Retrieves the end time of the schedule as a `datetime.datetime <https://docs.python.org/3/library/datetime.html#datetime.datetime>`_.

:return: The end time of the schedule.
:type return: datetime.datetime

Schedule_reportsteps.doc:
Retrieves a list of all report steps in the schedule as a Python list of `datetime.datetime <https://docs.python.org/3/library/datetime.html#datetime.datetime>`_ objects.

:return: A list containing the report steps of the schedule.
:type return: list

Schedule_len.doc:
Returns the number of report steps, i.e., the length of the Schedule.

:return: The number of report steps.
:type return: int

Schedule_get_well.doc:
Retrieves a well at a given report step.

:param well_name: The name of the well.
:type well_name: str
:param report_step: The report step.
:type report_step: int

:return: Well object at the given report step. 
:type return: well

Schedule_get_wells.doc:
Gets the names of wells at the given report step.

:param report_step: The report step.
:type report_step: int

:return: A list containing the names of wells at the given report step. 
:type return: list

Schedule_well_names.doc:
Gets the names of wells matching a specified pattern.

:param well_name_pattern: The pattern for well names, where '*' acts as a wildcard.
:type well_name_pattern: str

:return: A list containing the names of wells that match the specified pattern. 
:type return: list

Schedule_insert_keywords_list.doc:
Inserts the given keywords into the Schedule at the given report step.

:param keywords: A Python list of strings, contianing the keywords.
:type keyword_list: list
:param step: The report step.
:type step: int

Schedule_insert_keywords_data_step_unit_.signature: opm.io.schedule.Schedule.insert_keywords(data: str, step: int, unit_system: UnitSystem) -> None
Schedule_insert_keywords_data_step_unit_.doc:
Inserts the given keywords into the Schedule at the given report step using the given unit system.

:param data: The deck string to be inserted into the Schedule.
:type data: str
:param step: The report step.
:type step: int
:param unit_system: The unit system.
:type unit_system: UnitSystem

Schedule_insert_keywords_data_step.doc:
Inserts the given keywords into the Schedule at the given report step using the unit system of the Schedule.

:param data: The deck string to be inserted into the Schedule.
:type data: str
:param step: The report step.
:type step: int

Schedule_insert_keywords_data.doc:
Inserts the given keywords into the Schedule at the current report step using the unit system of the Schedule.

:param data: The deck string to be inserted into the Schedule.
:type data: str

Schedule_contains.doc:
Checks if a well exists in the Schedule at the current report step.

:param well_name: The name of the well to check.
:type well_name: str

:return: True if the well exists, False otherwise. 
:type return: bool

Group_name.doc:
Returns the name of this group.

:return: The name of this group.
:type return: str

Group_num_wells.doc:
Returns the number of wells in this group.

:return: The number of wells in this group.
:type return: int

Group_well_names.doc:
Returns a list of all well names in this group.

:return: A list of all well names in this group.
:type return: list

ScheduleState_nupcol.doc: The NUPCOL value at this Schedule State. This is a positive integer that defines the maximum number of Newton iterations used to update well targets within a time step.

ScheduleState_get_group.doc:
Gets the group with the specified name from the schedule state.

:param group_name: The name of the group to retrieve from the schedule state.
:type group_name: str

:return: The group with the specified name from the schedule state. 
:type return: Group

Well_pos.doc:
Retrieves the position of the well.

:return: A tuple containing the (i, j) coordinates and the reference depth of the well. 
:type return: tuple

Well_isdefined.doc:
Checks if the well is defined at a specific report step.

:param report_step: The report step to check for the well's definition.
:type report_step: int

:return: True if the well is defined at the specified report step, False otherwise. 
:type return: bool

Well_available_gctrl.doc:
Checks if the well is available for group control.

:return: True if the well is available for group control, False otherwise. 
:type return: bool

Well_connections.doc:
Gets a list of all connections associated with the well.

:return: A list containing all connections of the well. 
:type return: list
